淘.definition: to wash; to clean out; to cleanse; to eliminate; to dredge

淘客.definition: talk (loanword); chatline of PRC Internet company Taobao, taokshop.com

淘寶.definition: Taobao, a Chinese online shopping website (abbr. for 淘寶網|淘宝网[Tao2 bao3 Wang3])

淘寶網.definition: Taobao Marketplace, a Chinese website for online shopping

淘析.definition: to strain; to wash and filter

淘汰.definition: to wash out; (fig.) to cull; to weed out; to eliminate; to die out; to phase out

淘金.definition: to pan for gold; to try to make a fortune
